Html:
If you want to select all tasks assigned to current user, you must use this query:
http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa544234.aspx
<Or>
<Membership Type=\"CurrentUserGroups\">
<FieldRef Name=\"AssignedTo\"/>
</Membership>
<Eq>
<FieldRef Name=\"AssignedTo\"></FieldRef>
<Value Type=\"Integer\">
<UserID/>
</Value>
</Eq>
</Or>

Is it possible to support Memebership and UserID? (In CamlMethods class?)
